original_title: Julius and Creasy enters 2024 celebrating 145th anniversary in SL
original_body_lines: Julius and Creasy commenced its 145th Anniversary celebration on 2 January. Mementos were gifted to the staff members to coincide with the anniversary; precedent and senior partner S.A. Cader cut the anniversary cake. Julius and Creasy was founded by two British Solicitors in 1879.
